Blog.post: The past few days in skool, wasnt that gd... dunnoe... was having my pms.. needed someone to shower me wif care,, but dun seem to haf it...not like befor... dunnoe... 3 days befor my prelims.. I'm so STRESS UP though i have been studying.. friends in skool ...hai... things are not gg well for me... Nat had her piano practical today even though she said she screwed up .. i leave it to God's hand as i know she had done her best ya!!! i reali hope she will pass, i dun wan to her upset... ya!!! pls god!! thanks... Today is "satan" bday , things didnt go as i plan too.. anyway , had tis feeling.. oh well but i was kind enough to go ''satan" place to gif but wasnt at home.. tml is my two gd frens bday RUTH DAS N JAMAICA !!! turnin 17th!!! hahaha... hai... I REALI PONDER .................. WHAT ARE TRUE FRIENDS ???

Yesterday, cam to skool on the dot.... been coming to skool on the dot..dunno y?? had 'o' level coursework b for abt 2 hours.. baked 4 diff. cakes.They r butter, shortening , olive n margarine.. they r diff kind of fats..It wen well.... As usual The "satan" didnt go to skool nv say anything expect to know everything. SUppose to meet up for lunch... nv apologise, I NV COMPLAIN oR SAY ANYTHING !!! When i do someting that's not rite or something, wans me to apologise? FAir??? In skool, didnt reali talk to my circle of frens, jus was PMSING.. didnt wan to haf any tiff wif anyone.. Jus wanted LOVE , CARE N ATTENTION frm someone but turn OUT nothing.. Another person was givin it to me , but i didnt Bother... I HATE MY MENS!!! ITS jus not MYSELF !!! When out in the evening ... things was so worse that i ever expected IT TO HAPPEN.................................................................................................. Tried to be happy , it became worse.... ITS THE WORSE OUTING N EVENING I EVER HAD IN MY ENTIRE LIFE.... N WILL NV FORGET IT!!! i didnt go back home till 1145pm. i went to the park n cried like nobody business /cried till my tears cant tear no more didnt wan to confront anyone...jus needed to think of certain things......................................... I NV GONE THROUGH SO MUCH SHIT AS BEFORE................... I GUESS TIS RETRIBUTION................................................ I DUNNOE................................. I'M not gonna do anythin till u do something. tired of changing , dun like it , den forget it !!!!!!!!!! Hope tis sat will be a better day!! i'm feeling better now saying all tis... cant sleep.... eyes are like so red!!!

today , my sis help me to make tis blog... thanks sis!! I aint a computer expert . haha.. today lesson was exhasting..not reali actuali!! had 4 perids of amaths , a break follow by another 3 more eng n mother tongue... can DIE!!! had mens yest, my stomach was killing me...dunno y??? i hate mens ... During eng lesson , sat in front of the teacher was told to do so . My partner ruth ruth... she is a nice girl !!! It was boring boy!! went through compre n pic conversation , could say after the 2nd period half of my class ppl were like FALLING aSLEEP boy!! i also kinda... hahaha.... After skool , went to gardens saw james n thanes... they are my gd frens... hahaha... den went to coffee bean to study to wait for my SATAN PIGGY BUM suppose to meet me early but must take his own sweet time ... He met me at 4 and studied... practisin emaths n were irritatin each other... abt 6 head to chomp chomp to makan,had a small tiff. Satan didnt said bye to me... -pout-... sad..................... IDIOT SATAN!!!!! but ...........................................................................still "HATE" U !!!! hahaha---bleah---
